*ERROR:* LoadError: InitError: could not load library “/Users/mahdimirhosseini/.julia/artifacts/2018f695f704168dba88d7630bf076a6ab66bcfb/lib/libx264.161.dylib”

*it happens today and the only thing I changed is that my MacOS has updated this morning to Big Sur* 11.2.2. Nothing else has been changed.
*I have tried the following link procedure already and the problem is still there:*
<https://github.com/JuliaPlots/Plots.jl/issues/2886>
I also reinstalled Julia 1.5.3 and it didn’t help either…
Anyone has a clue? what else should I try?
